trans_title: 情歌爱故事系列之服输
Love Songs Love Stories: Heart Surrender
Love Songs Love Stories: Pae Jai
情歌爱情故事:心的投降
introduction: 被女朋友甩了之后，费伊深受伤害。她相信她没有办法再次敞开心扉...直到她遇到Mameaw，一个来打开费伊心柜的女孩。Fay was deeply hurt after getting dumped by her girlfriend. She believes that there is no way for her to open her heart again... until she meets Mameaw, a girl who came to unlock the drawer where Fay kept her heart.(Source: Translated from Siam Zone)
chinese_title: 情歌爱故事系列之服输
foreign_title: Love Songs Love Stories เพลง แพ้ใจ
